short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used in conjunction with the KIY plugin on Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to enable Chrome browser communication with the KIY hardware. The plugin communicates via Native Messaging. You will need to install the KIYPlugin Helper for KIY activation on the oneKIY platform . Please visit http://www.onekiy.com.
